headline.main: SEES BOON IN VICHY BAN; Henry Bernstein Now Feels Free to Wear French Honor

lead_paragraph: Henry Bernstein, French playwright, who with twenty-eight other men and women was deprived of French citizenship by the Vichy government last May, and whose membership in the Legion of Honor was canceled Thursday, replied yesterday to the action as follows:
